item.description:
Hey there,

The Sea Monsters have been tearing it up every sunday night at Precinct in Somerville's Union Square. They're an incredible collection of excellent boston area musicians and their shows are eclectic and electric, guaranteed to get you up on your feet.

Remember, monday is a a holiday! You can sleep in! Come out and have some Fun with Alcohol! (and a bit of live music)

So don't think about it, just come on out and see the Sea Monsters.

This is a joint Meetup with Boston Live Music so we usually get 5-10 attendees...
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the guy with the ponytail, Paul's the guy without a ponytail. We both kinda look like our pictures :-)
item.name: Sea Monsters @ Precinct
